document_data.name: ''Potion of Strength''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potions of strength''''' were magical brews that made the consumer stronger for a prolonged period of time.
document_data.Powers: Imbibing one of these [[potion]]s gave the drinker a surge of power, slightly increases their strength. The muscles seemed to ripple and bulge, filled with pulling magic. The effects of one dose of a ''potion of strength'' lasted for a bit over three hours.
document_data.History:
''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, a vial of the potion could be found in the ruined [[Mantor's Library]] in the city of [[Phlan]], within a nest of a hungry [[basilisk]].

In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, agents of the [[Cult of the Dragon]], who took over the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]] under the leadership of [[Kya Mordrayn]], carried ''potions of strength'' as part of the standard cult equipment.
